text:
A Night of Revelry

A dim tavern, filled with smoke.  
Marmeladov leans in, excited.  
Marmeladov: “Sonia comforts Katerina Ivanovna, you know?”  

Marmeladov: “The Kapernaumovs are poor, all with cleft palates.”  

---  

A bustling tavern, laughter and music.  
Marmeladov gestures wildly.  
Marmeladov: “His excellency Ivan Afanasyvitch, a man of God!”  

Marmeladov: “I kissed the dust at his feet... in thought.”  

Marmeladov: “Then I returned home, and what a to-do!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Marmeladov recounts his struggles and the support of Sonia and Katerina Ivanovna amidst their poverty.
